entries.title: Zelenskyy to address Congress as House Republicans grow skeptical about more aid
entries.description: The timing of Zelenskyy's dramatic visit to Washington comes as the incoming House GOP majority's reluctance to approve more big money for Ukraine mounts.

entries.title: Hunter Biden retains top defense lawyer ahead of expected GOP probes
entries.description: Ahead of an expected deluge of GOP probes, President Joe Biden's son Hunter has retained high-powered defense lawyer Abbe Lowell to help navigate congressional oversight.

entries.title: Alaskans use vehicles to light up dark runway so medevac flight can land
entries.description: Residents of a small Alaskan town used their vehicles to light up a dark airstrip to help a medevac plane land to pick up a patient on Sunday.

entries.title: Israel's Netanyahu says he has formed new government
entries.description: Designated Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says he has successfully formed a new coalition to govern Israel

entries.title: Zelenskyy’s security in Washington being treated as 'mini-state visit,' sources say
entries.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy’s visit to Washington is being treated as "mini state visit," sources said.

entries.title: Congress to bestow medal to Emmett Till and his mother
entries.description: The House has unanimously passed a bill posthumously awarding the Congressional Gold Medal to Emmett Till, the Chicago teenager murdered by white supremacists in the 1950s, and his mother, Mamie Till-Mobley

entries.title: Ex-Harvard coach, dad acquitted in admissions bribery case
entries.description: A former Harvard fencing coach was acquitted Wednesday of charges that he accepted more than $1.5 million in bribes in exchange for designating a wealthy businessman’s two sons as recruits to help secure their admission to the elite university

entries.title: New bridge to open in place of collapsed Pittsburgh span
entries.description: Pennsylvania officials say a newly built bridge to replace the one that collapsed in Pittsburgh will open to traffic by the end of December

entries.title: 8 girls, some just 13 years old, charged in Toronto fatal 'swarming' knife attack
entries.description: Eight teenage girls are facing murder charges, accused of fatally stabbing a 59-year-old man in downtown Toronto in what police described as a "swarming" attack.

entries.title: Charges dropped against ex-NFL wide receiver Antonio Brown
entries.description: Former NFL wide receiver Antonio Brown will not face charges stemming from a domestic incident in Tampa, Florida

entries.title: WHO 'very concerned' about reports of severe COVID in China
entries.description: The head of the World Health Organization said the agency is “very concerned” about rising reports of severe coronavirus disease across China after the country largely abandoned its “zero COVID” policy

entries.title: Russian hurdler stripped of 2012 Olympics gold for doping
entries.description: Russian 400-meter hurdler Natalya Antyukh will lose her gold medal from the 2012 London Games because of doping

entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried agrees to extradition, clearing path for transport to US
entries.description: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried is facing federal charges of fraud and conspiracy in the U.S.

entries.title: Man gets parole after retrial conviction in 1995 killing
entries.description: A New York man who was recently retried and convicted in a 1995 killing is set to get out of prison on parole as soon as next month

entries.title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy in Washington live updates: Biden visit, address to Congress
entries.description: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is visiting Washington -- making his first trip outside Ukraine since the Russian invasion began in February.

entries.title: Estranged kids of Canada condo gunman say he was abusive
entries.description: Three estranged daughters of a 73-year-old man who fatally shot five people in his condominium near Toronto say he “was a controlling and abusive husband and father.”

entries.title: Judge appointed Yankees captain after reaching longterm deal
entries.description: Aaron Judge was appointed captain of the New York Yankees.

entries.title: Scotland's move to simplify gender change stirs strong views
entries.description: A plan by Scotland’s government to make it easier for people to change gender for legal purposes has sparked acrimonious debate both inside and outside of the Edinburgh parliament

entries.title: WEB - LINK - BREAKING NEWS LIVE BLOG
Dead man found in wheel of jet flown from Gambia to England
entries.description: Gambian authorities say that a dead man was found in the wheel bay of an airplane that flew from Gambia to Britain

entries.title: Don't get 'so drunk' you need hospital during strike, UK health official says
entries.description: Brits have been urged to “drink responsibly” during pre-Christmas celebrations to avoid hospital visits as thousands of ambulance workers strike.

entries.title: Russia's defense minister calls for expanding military
entries.description: Russia’s defense minister says the country’s military must be expanded from its current 1 million personnel to 1.5 million amid the fighting in Ukraine

entries.title: Afghan women weep as Taliban fighters enforce university ban
entries.description: Taliban security forces in Afghanistan's capital city are upholding a higher education ban for women by blocking access to university campuses

entries.title: Steelers Hall of Fame running back Franco Harris dies at 72
entries.description: Hall of Fame running back Franco Harris has died

entries.title: Don't get drunk: UK govt urges caution amid ambulance strike
entries.description: Thousands of ambulance workers in Britain are staging a 24-hour strike.

entries.title: Video shows 11-year-old getting off bus before she went missing
entries.description: Officials searching for missing 11-year-old Madalina Cojocari released a video showing the North Carolina girl getting off a school bus days before she was last seen.

entries.title: On the holidays, efforts to distract Ukrainian kids from war
entries.description: Ukrainian children have seen the horrors of a 10-month war.

entries.title: Storm adds uncertainty to strong holiday travel demand
entries.description: Concerns about inflation aren’t stopping Americans from hitting the road.

entries.title: Women sexually abused by ICU nurse sue Colorado hospital
entries.description: Two women say a nurse sexually assaulted them while they were unconscious.

entries.title: WATCH:  'Christmas not canceled' in war-torn Bucha
entries.description: ABC News' Britt Clennett is in Bucha, the scene of death and destruction amid Russia's invasion of Ukraine, where our team saw a tree-lighting ceremony that is a symbol of Ukrainian resistance.

entries.title: WATCH:  Train derails after colliding with tractor-trailer in Tennessee
entries.description: Two crew members were transported to the hospital after a train collided with a tractor-trailer in Tennessee.

entries.title: Man pleads guilty in Florida woman's unsolved 1991 slaying
entries.description: A man already imprisoned in Florida for another killing has pleaded guilty to the unsolved 1991 slaying of a woman he met at a bar

entries.title: Sam Bankman-Fried signs extradition papers, will return to US for charges
entries.description: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried has now signed extradition papers in the Bahamas, where he lived in a million-dollar mansion, after waffling on the decision one day prior.

entries.title: Trump tax return-related documents to be released by congressional committee
entries.description: Documents related to former President Donald Trump's tax returns will be released by the Democratic-controlled House Ways and Means Committee.

entries.title: SC official says Alex Murdaugh will not face death penalty
entries.description: State prosecutors will not seek the death penalty for Alex Murdaugh when the disbarred attorney appears in court next month for a double murder trial that has drawn international attention

entries.title: Elon Musk says he'll resign as head of Twitter
entries.description: "I will resign as CEO as soon as I find someone foolish enough to take the job!" Musk tweeted Tuesday.

entries.title: DEA seized enough fentanyl to kill every American in 2022
entries.description: The Drug Enforcement Administration on Tuesday said it has seized more than 379 million deadly doses of fentanyl this year.

entries.title: Nazi symbol carved onto family's menorah in 'despicable' act
entries.description: A man allegedly vandalized and carved a Nazi symbol into the base of a large menorah in Beverly Hills, California, on the first night of Hanukkah, according to police.
